summary: This is the second edition of DELSU Tech Invasion (DTI) with the theme: Learn . Innovate . Earn. The subject or focus area is Python for Academics: Spreadsheet and Data Manipulation, Data Analytics and Visualization.
speaking:
- Developing lite web apps using Flask and Python - [Michael Oghenerukevwe Edward](http://linkedin.com/in/airdward/)
- Transitioning in Tech Ecosystem as a Female - [Precious Ogbuka](https://www.linkedin.com/in/precious-ogbuka)
- Rapid Development of Desktop Apps using Tkinter and Python - [Azubuike Uche Nathan](https://x.com/NathanAzub10827)
- Why Learn, Innovate and Earn - [Naomi Apomejevwe Egbe](https://x.com/IamNaomiEgbe)
- Gender diversity and inclusion in the tech ecosystem - [Elozino Onorie](https://x.com/_hush_7)
- others can be found in the links below:
  - https://dti.hamplustech.com/pages/speaker/
  - https://dti.hamplustech.com/pages/schedule/
